title: Remote Sales and Administrative Assistant (English & Spanish, US Time Zone)
salary: $500–$800 USD per month, plus 1% commission on all catering sales closed
job_overview:
Seeking a motivated and reliable virtual assistant to drive remote sales outreach for Jimmy John’s catering services and provide light administrative support for our hospitality and real estate businesses.
 • Conduct outreach to local businesses and organizations to promote and sell catering services (calls, emails, follow-ups).
 • Manage leads, book orders, and maintain customer relationships.
 • Assist with scheduling, email management, data entry, and tenant communication.
 • Bilingual (English/Spanish) preferred—many tenants are Latino.
 • Must have excellent spoken and written English with a neutral or clear accent.
 • Work hours: Must be available during US Eastern Time business hours.
 • Base monthly salary plus commission (1% of sales closed, or locally adjusted equivalent).
